can you attach the .launch file that fails parsing (CVS UI Tests.launch)?

resolving as worksforme, the launch manager is designed to throw an exception if the launch configuration file is corrupt and cannot be read (it also could be that the file was manually edited or out of sync with the file system).

traces.message: The content of elements must consist of well-formed character data or markup.
